content:
@article{10.1074/jbc.ra120.013148,
    author = {Albert Remus R. Rosana and Denise S. Whitford and Anzhela Migur and Claudia Steglich and Sonya L. Kujat-Choy and Wolfgang R. Hess and George W. Owttrim},
    title = {RNA helicase–regulated processing of the Synechocystis rimO–crhR operon results in differential cistron expression and accumulation of two sRNAs},
    journal = {Journal of Biological Chemistry},
    pages = {6372-6386},
    year = {2020},
    month = {05},
    doi = {10.1074/jbc.ra120.013148},
    url = {https://doi.org/10.1074/jbc.ra120.013148},
    abstract = {This study investigates the RNA helicase-regulated processing of the Synechocystis rimO–crhR operon, revealing differential cistron expression and the accumulation of two small RNAs (sRNAs). The findings contribute to understanding the regulatory mechanisms of RNA metabolism in cyanobacteria.}
}
